name: ElateSoftware
description:
ElateSoftware is a full-stack Mobile App Development company based in Belarus and specialized in building high-quality native mobile apps for iOS and Android devices.
We provide a full-cycle of customized software development for small, midsized and large companies in E-commerce, Tourism, Entertainment, Transportation and other industries.
Our main principle is to produce a user-friendly service by following the idea of a personal approach to our every customer and project.
